name: Viewport
desc: A widget through which a portion of larger content can be viewed, typically in combination with a [Scrollable].

fields.name: axisDirection
fields.desc: The direction in which the [offset]'s [ViewportOffset.pixels] increases.

fields.name: crossAxisDirection
fields.desc: The direction in which child should be laid out in the cross axis.

fields.name: anchor
fields.desc: The relative position of the zero scroll offset.

fields.name: offset
fields.desc: Which part of the content inside the viewport should be visible.

fields.name: center
fields.desc: The first child in the [GrowthDirection.forward] growth direction.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of Viewport
desc: You can run this code to see how the ColorItem is constructed, the 128 color bars are not all constructed at once.
